# bcPAHwqg

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install the development version of bcPAHwqg from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ateucher/bcPAHwqg")
```

## Example


```{r}
library(bcPAHwqg)

# Set the path to the TUV directory
options(tuv_dir = "~/dev/TUV/V5.4")

# Set the options for the TUV model run:
setup_tuv_options(
  depth_m = 0.25,
  lat = 49.601632,
  lon = -119.605862,
  elev_km = 0.342,
  DOC = 5,
  date = "2023-06-21"
)

# Run the TUV model
tuv()

res <- get_tuv_results(file = "out_irrad_y")
head(res)

# Calculate Pabs
(Pabs <- p_abs(res, "anthracene"))

# Calculate PLC50
plc_50(Pabs, NLC50 = 450)
```
